snippet.title: Fishing at the bottom of your screen! | Idle Waters | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Idle Waters
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2963540/Idle_Waters

A relaxing idle fishing game that waits for you at the bottom of the screen while you do other things. CATCH, COLLECT and DISPLAY fishes!

You can focus on other tasks while playing because it will stay at the bottom of your screen. You may zoom in or out, change the layout, or hide it completely.

Unlike other games, the fish waits for you! When you are ready, click on the game to catch the fish.

Different ecosystems with unique fishes to catch.

Keep fishing to complete the collection with their color variants.

Look at your collection and customize the fish tank. You may move it, zoom in or out independently.
